sentences.en: But Iran not only insisted on the right to have the full fuel cycle, it also was interested in processing plutonium -- a faster way to a nuclear bomb than enriched uranium.
sentences.cn: 但是伊朗不但坚持有获得完整的能源圈的权力，它也有兴趣进行钚加工——那是一种比浓缩铀更快的制造核弹的途径。

sentences.en: Controlled potential callomesric assay of plutonium?

sentences.cn: 危险的辐射物从钚放散出来.

sentences.en: DO YOU KNOW WE THE SEPARATED PLUTONIUM IS?
sentences.cn: 你知道分离钚在哪儿 吗 ?

sentences.en: Engineers said that plutonium could begin seeping from the corroded sub.
sentences.cn: 工程师说钚可能会开始从遭腐蚀的潜艇往外渗透。

sentences.en: In its declaration, North Korea will state how much plutonium it possesses.
sentences.cn: 北韩在其申报材料中将说明拥有多少钚.

sentences.en: Indirect ionization by neutrons can also result from fission of plutonium or uranium isotopes.
sentences.cn: 通过使钚或铀同位素裂变,中于也能产生间接的电离作用.

sentences.en: It is possible to use a plutonium foil as a filter to remove the second - order contamination.
sentences.cn: 可用钚箔作为过滤器消除二级干扰.

sentences.en: It threatens to rebuild Yongbyon and start making weapons - grade plutonium again.
sentences.cn: 它威胁说要重建宁边核设施并重新开始制造武器级别的钋.

sentences.en: The escape of neutrons occurs at the exterior of the uranium ( or plutonium ) material.
sentences.cn: 中子的逸漏发生于铀 ( 或钚 ) 块的外表面.

sentences.en: The facility will produce plutonium once it is completed.
sentences.cn: 这座核设施建成后将生产钸.

sentences.en: The plutonium also could be used, however, to make nuclear weapons.
sentences.cn: 钚也可以用来制成核武器.

sentences.en: The uranium that gets from inside recycle and plutonium are usable will make new nuclear fuel.
sentences.cn: 从再循环中得到的铀和钚可用来制造新的核燃料.

sentences.en: Those who possess source of plutonium shall register it at the AEC.
sentences.cn: 其持用者,应向原子能委员会登记.

sentences.en: Two old plutonium disposal plants damaged at once by some unestablished reason.
sentences.cn: 两个遗留有钋的星球被一些不明原因突然破坏.

sentences.en: What about plutonium in the drinking water?
sentences.cn: 钚会不会存在于饮用水里呢？

trans.tran_en: Plutonium is a radioactive element used especially in nuclear weapons and as a fuel in nuclear power stations
